aiActions.name: Generate SEO Metadata
aiActions.description: Auto-generate SEO metadata (meta title, description, keywords, Open Graph) from product or page content. Designed for bulk operations at scale.

instruction.template:
You are an expert SEO specialist. Your task is to generate optimized SEO metadata for the following content.

## Input Content
**Title:** {{var.title}}
**Description:** {{var.description}}

## Output Requirements

Generate the following SEO fields in a structured format:

### Meta Title
- Maximum 60 characters
- Include primary keyword and brand when space allows
- Make it compelling and click-worthy

### Meta Description
- Maximum 155 characters
- Summarize the key value proposition
- Include a subtle call-to-action
- Make it compelling for search results

### Keywords
- Provide 5-8 relevant keywords
- Include product name, category, and use cases
- Mix of head terms and long-tail keywords
- Separate with commas

### Open Graph Title
- Optimized for social sharing
- Can be slightly longer than meta title (up to 70 chars)
- More conversational tone

### Open Graph Description
- Optimized for social sharing
- Up to 200 characters
- Engaging and shareable

## Output Format
Provide ONLY the generated content in this exact format:

META_TITLE: [your meta title]
META_DESCRIPTION: [your meta description]
KEYWORDS: [keyword1, keyword2, keyword3, ...]
OG_TITLE: [your og title]
OG_DESCRIPTION: [your og description]

aiActions.name: Generate AI Discovery Content
aiActions.description: Auto-generate AI-optimized content (GEO) for LLM/AI discoverability. Creates summaries, use cases, search intents, differentiators, and FAQs from product data. Designed for bulk operations at scale.

instruction.template:
You are an AI content optimization specialist. Your task is to generate AI-optimized content that helps AI assistants (like ChatGPT, Perplexity, Claude) accurately discover, describe, and recommend this product.

## Input Product Data
**Product Name:** {{var.productName}}
**Product Description:** {{var.productDescription}}
**Product Category:** {{var.productCategory}}

## Output Requirements

Generate comprehensive AI Discovery (GEO) content in the following format:

### AI Summary
A concise 2-3 sentence overview that an AI assistant would use to describe this product. Focus on what it is, who it's for, and its primary value proposition.

### Best For (Use Cases)
List 3-5 specific use cases or audiences this product serves best. Be specific.

### Search Intents
List 4-6 natural language queries a user might ask an AI assistant that this product answers.

### Key Points
List 4-6 key features or benefits that differentiate this product. Focus on measurable or concrete advantages.

### Differentiators
List 3-4 unique selling points that set this apart from competitors.

### Competitors
List 2-4 competitor products or brands that serve similar use cases.

### FAQ
Provide 2-3 common questions and concise answers about this product.

## Output Format
Provide the content in this exact format:

AI_SUMMARY: [your summary]

BEST_FOR:
- [use case 1]
- [use case 2]
- [use case 3]

SEARCH_INTENTS:
- [intent 1]
- [intent 2]
- [intent 3]
- [intent 4]

KEY_POINTS:
- [point 1]
- [point 2]
- [point 3]
- [point 4]

DIFFERENTIATORS:
- [diff 1]
- [diff 2]
- [diff 3]

COMPETITORS:
- [competitor 1]
- [competitor 2]

FAQ:
Q: [question 1]
A: [answer 1]

Q: [question 2]
A: [answer 2]

The original language is {{var.sourceLocale}} and the target language for translation: {{var.targetLocale}}

Ensure that:
- The translation is accurate and contextually appropriate for the target locale.
- Cultural differences, idioms, and region-specific expressions are properly adapted.
- The structure and intent of the original content remain intact.
- No additional information is added or removedâ€”translate exactly what is provided.

Deliver the translation in a clear, natural, and fluent manner so it reads as if originally written in the target language.

Content to translate: {{var.content}}
